params.pool: The address of the pool for which to fetch populated tick data
params.tickBitmapIndex: The index of the word in the tick bitmap for which to parse the bitmap and fetch all the populated ticks

returns.populatedTicks: An array of tick data for the given word in the tick bitmap

getPopulatedTicksInWord(address,int16).notice: Get all the tick data for the populated ticks from a word of the tick bitmap of a pool
